mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY B.SUBJECT_TYPE_CD, B.SRT_NO) AS RNO , A.QUIZ_USER_ANS_SEQ , A.USER_ID , A.USER_ANSWER , A.ANSWER_CHK , A.TAKE_REV , B.QUIZ_MSTR_INFO_SEQ , B.SUBJECT_TYPE_CD , B.SRT_NO , B.ANSWER FROM QUIZ_USER_ANS A, QUIZ_MSTR_INFO B WHERE A.QUIZ_MSTR_INFO_SEQ = B.QUIZ_MSTR_INFO_SEQ AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND B.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.USER_ID = #{userId}
